Summary: ufo sighting at night by two people
divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). My wife and myself were walking our dog and looked at what we thought tobe an aircraft of some sort. This aircraft could be described to look like acomet that was not moving and did not have a comets tail,like a comet it had ablue white color except it had a small red light on the side of it. The redlight looked like a navagation light of an aircraft.There were cloulds to theright of it. This object stayed stationary for a minute the moved extremelyquickly to the right and into the cloulds. This was at night. If you have beeninformed of any simular sighting please contact us at our E-mailaddress.Otherwise we wish to remain anonymous.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wellfleet
